Plan A(Click here for more details)
- For all full-time and part-time local or overseas domestic helpers, except
i. post-natal care helper and domestic helper with driving duties
ii. helper with an annual income exceeding HK$200,000
For i or ii, please call our Sales Hotline on 2839 6333 for enquiry. For product leaflet, please click here.
Plan B & C(Click here for more details)
- Applicable to full-time overseas domestic helper only.
- Provide Optional Major Disease Rider Selection of additional coverage for heart diseases, cancers, cysts, tumours or carcinoma in situ.
* Applicant MUST be 18 years old or above.
* Domestic helper(s) should be between the ages of 18 and 60 years. The policy is renewable up to the age of 65.
* The policy must commence within 60 days from the date of application.
